scripts.pretest: rm -rf cypress/screenshots cypress/fixtures/downloads cypress/videos cypress/test-results cypress/auth-token .nyc_output coverage
scripts.eslint: npx eslint --fix --fix-type suggestion,layout cypress/support/commands.js cypress/support/e2e.js cypress.config.js cypress/support/steps cypress/support/utils/ cypress/support/components/ cypress/support/components/ cypress/support/api-requests/ cypress/plugins/ cypress/reporting/
scripts.4casthub:web:sanity:headless: dotenv -- cross-var cypress-tags run -e TAGS='%FEATURE% and @SANITY' --browser %BROWSER% --headless
scripts.4casthub:web:gui: dotenv -- cross-var cypress-tags run -e TAGS='%FEATURE% and @UI' --browser %BROWSER% --headed
scripts.4casthub:android:headless: dotenv -- cross-var cypress-tags run -e TAGS='%FEATURE% and @UI' --config viewportWidth=360,viewportHeight=640 --browser %BROWSER% --headless
scripts.4casthub:android:gui: dotenv -- cross-var cypress-tags run -e TAGS='%FEATURE% and @UI' --config viewportWidth=360,viewportHeight=640 --browser %BROWSER% --headed
scripts.4casthub:ios:headless: dotenv -- cross-var cypress-tags run -e TAGS='%FEATURE% and @UI' --config viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=812  --browser %BROWSER% --headless
scripts.4casthub:ios:gui: dotenv -- cross-var cypress-tags run -e TAGS='%FEATURE% and @UI' --config viewportWidth=375,viewportHeight=812 --browser %BROWSER%
scripts.4casthub:report: npm run report:html && npm run jira:qmetry
scripts.jira:qmetry: cucumber-json-merge -d cypress/test-results/cucumber-json/ && mv merged-test-results.json cypress/test-results/merged-test-results.json && node cypress/reporting/qmetry.js
scripts.owasp:cypress: dotenv -- cross-var cross-env HTTP_PROXY=http://%ZAP_IPADDRESS%:8080 NO_PROXY="<-loopback>" cypress-tags run -e TAGS='@%TAG%' --browser %BROWSER% --headless
scripts.owasp:report: npm run owasp:cypress && npm run owasp:zap-active-scan
